content:
This week we are looking at buttons, and how we can make them more irresistible to your customers.

The following are all content changes, so you can make these changes without a developer's help

1. Use action words

Some action words you could use;

  • Get the look
  • Create an account
  • Reserve your copy
  • Buy lamp
  • Join the community

2. Be transparent

Don't hide your important links within paragraphs, give them a beautiful button.

Be clear about what will happen when the button is clicked.

  • Subscribe to UX Tips Weekly
  • Buy the TrendMaster 3000

Be transparent, it can be a super power.

  • Create an account for free
  • Reserve your spot, cancel any time
